A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wait\, is this is the wrong movie.  I'm looking for the \"SJW Wars\"..........  Huge Star Wars fan but this is movie was absolute garbage.  It completely destroyed the legacy left by George Lucas.  The six movies made by Lucas are rendered irrelevant by the Last Jedi.  The lore has been shattered.  At times I thought I was seeing a Mel Brooks spoof \"Feminists in Space\".  Every male character is an idiot.  Every female character is wonder woman.  The leftist agenda is strong in disney star wars.  And besides all those pleasant elements\, the plot is garbage\, there is no story  And all intrigue has been eliminated.  I have no interest in the remaining characters.  I don't care what happens in episode 9.  For all I care both sides can blow one another up.  Please do and then sell the franchise back to George Lucas so he can redo this trilogy.  I won't be watching any\,ore disney star wars\, or rather sjw wars.
